'''''Amon Hen'' 282''' is the two-hundred-and-eighty-second issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in March [[2020]].

==Contents==

* Cover: ''Alatar''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]], Spike Jones, R.P. Weston, Bert Lee
* Artwork: ''White Ship''
** By: [[Soni Alcorn-Hender]]
* Contents
* Dates for your Diary
** By: Ian Collier
* Announcements
* AGM Announcement
* Oxonmoot Announcement
* Artwork: ''Sam at Caradhras''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* All Br√¢n
** By: Ian Spittlehouse
* Report: Stormy Ring Quest 2020
** By: Alan Baxter
* Behind Glass Doors (double bill)
** By: Ian Collier
* Letters
* Encounters: The Request
** By: M.R. Willetts
* Artwork: ''Seat of Seeing''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* New From Fangorn 
** By: Carol Brownlow
* Report: Three Farthing Stone Smial
** By: Maggie Bailey
* Artwork: ''Into the Wild''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Michael's Miscellany
** By: Michael Flowers
* Artwork: ''Somewhere in Mordor...''
** By: Gordon Palmer
* Committee
